name: Virtual Interactive Classroom for Teachers and the Challenging Technologies in Post Covid-19 Era
content: IFERP organizes the webinar on “Virtual Interactive Classroom for Teachers and the Challenging Technologies in Post Covid-19 Era” on June 05th, 2020 | 05.00 PM - 07.00 PM. The theme of the webinar is “Virtual Interactive Classroom for Teachers and the Challenging Technologies in Post Covid-19 Era”. The Webinar focus on the tools used for implementing virtual classrooms, smart manufacturing, digital library, work from home, IoT & Data Sciences and how to write research article and thesis.
